quoteText:
When you use Qwant, no personal information whatsoever is neither captured or transmitted to advertisers.
In details:
– No third party cookies
– No trackers
– No behavioral targeting
– No campaigns mixing legit and promotional content (native advertising)
title: only temporary session cookies

tosdr.case: This service only uses temporary session cookies
tosdr.tldr:
"When you use Qwant, no personal information whatsoever is neither captured or transmitted to advertisers.
In details:
– No third party cookies
– ..."

and 

"We don’t use any cookie nor any tracking device that may allow us to track your browsing habits or to establish your profile."
